abstract: In Thailand, a number of loose crocodiles are swimming through rising flood waters around the outskirts of Bangkok.
snippet: In Thailand, a number of loose crocodiles are swimming through rising flood waters around the outskirts of Bangkok.
lead_paragraph: First it was Bengal tigers in Ohio. Now it's crocodiles in Bangkok that have broken loose and are menacing the local population.

headline.main: Flood Waters Free Crocodiles in Thailand
